mapper.update: update tbl_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_updateDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select a.board_no , b.reply_no , b.reply_writer , b.reply_content , b.reply_regdate from soft.tbl_board a inner join soft.tbl_reply b on a.board_no = b.board_no where a.board_no = #{board_no};
SELECT board_no , board_title FROM tbl_board WHERE board_no < #{board_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT board_no , board_title FROM tbl_board WHERE board_no > #{board_no} ORDER BY board_no LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN board_regdate >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-01') AND board_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') THEN board_no END) AS dayCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN board_regdate >= DATE(NOW()) AND board_regdate < DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN board_no END) AS monthCnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN YEAR(board_regdate) = YEAR(NOW()) AND board_regdate < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-01-01'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) THEN board_no END) AS yearCnt FROM tbl_board;
